The newborn giraffe did not know why it was different. It wondered why it only saw tall buildings when walking along the ground with its mother.
The newborn giraffe was constantly tormented by other animals for its difference.
One day, the newborn giraffe had a strange feeling. It knew it was different, and it was proud of it.
Then, the newborn giraffe walked to all the animals and told them to accept it and respect its uncommonness.
The other animals were confused. They began to look for for more information about the newborn giraffe.
